description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Baklava recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Baklava Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 26x16cm shallow rectangle pan with a little of the butter. Process nuts and chocolate in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and stir in sugar and cinnamon.

Lay filo pastry sheets flat on a clean surface. Cover with a clean, damp tea towel. Brush 1 sheet of filo lightly with butter. Place another sheet on top and brush with butter. Repeat with another 4 sheets and butter to make a 6-sheet stack. Cut the stack into 3 and layer on top of each other. Transfer to pan and press down firmly. Spread half of the chocolate-nut mixture over filo.

Repeat filo layer with another 6 sheets and more of the butter. Transfer to pan and press down firmly. Spread with remaining chocolate-nut mixture. Repeat filo layer with another 6 sheets and more of the butter. Transfer to pan and press down firmly.
Using a small sharp knife, mark filo into diamonds. Bake for 50 minutes until golden and filo is crisp.

Meanwhile, combine honey, sugar, 1 cup water and vanilla in a small saucepan. Stir over medium heat until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil and simmer, without stirring, for 10 minutes. Set aside to cool.
Remove baklava from oven and immediately pour syrup over surface. Set aside to cool completely. Cut into diamonds to serve.
